content: falling leaves pattern by sara öhman ravelry saraohman e-mail info@saraoh se falling leaves gloves © sara öhman 1 materials 34 g/160 m of pip colourwork from baa ram ewe or any 3 ply/4 ply yarn knitting needles size 2 5 or size to obtain gauge gauge 32 stitches and 43 row = 10 cm/4 inches in stockinette after blocking using 2 5 mm needles pattern notes the german twisted cast on is also called old norwegian and i similar to the long tail cast on but a bit stretchier there are many tutorials online but i like the one from interweave abbreviations p = purl k = knit st s = stitch es m1r = make 1 right pick up the bar between the last stitch you knit and the one you are about to knit bringing the needle from the back to the front then knit into the front of the stitch m1l = make 1 left m1l pick up the bar between the stitch you knit and the one you are about to knit bringing the needle from front to back then knit into the back of the stitch k2tog = knit 2 stitches together falling leaves gloves © sara öhman 2 directions right mitten cuff cast on 56 sts with german twisted cast on or preferred method start working in the round be careful not to twist place marker for beginning of row round 1 p1 k1 p1 k21 p1 k1 until end of round rounds 2-27 p1 k1 p1 chart a for 21 sts p1 k1 until end of round lower hand and thumb gusset round 1 increase round for thumb gusset k3 row 1 of chart b for 21 sts k5 place marker m1r k1 m1l place marker and k to the end of the round rounds 2-3 k3 chart b for 21 sts k to the end of the round round 4 k3 chart b for 21 sts k to marker slip marker m1r k to marker m1l slip marker k to the end of the round repeat rounds 2-4 until row 24 on chart b is finished and there are 17 sts between the markers for the thumb gusset upper hand round 1 k3 row 1 of chart b for 21 sts k to marker remove markers and place the 17 thumb gusset sts on waste yarn cast on 1 st using the backward loop method and knit to end you will now have 56 sts again round 2-18 k3 chart b for 21 sts k to the end of the round place all stitches on waste yarn or holder fingers little finger from holder put 6 sts from the palm and 6 sts from the back on needle start the round on the back k6 cast on 2 sts using the backward loop method k6 you now have 14 sts knit 24 rounds or as many as you need next round k2tog to the end next round k1 k2tog to the end
